resources.string: Watch the toast messages on this screen and when you press back button as each event gets executed. After you press back button, this activity will be destroyed and hence rest of the events will be called.
Plug in your power cable to see the Broadcast Receiver respond to broadcast message(s) from the system itself.
It\'s a landscape mode. Rotate the phone to change orientation and run a different fragment.
It\'s a portrait mode. Rotate the phone to change orientation and run a different fragment.
Do not forget to stop the service or else it will keep running
